titleStmt.title: The first days entertainment at Rutland-House, by declamations and musick: after the manner of the ancients. / By Sr VV.D.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for H. Herringman, and sold at his shop at the Anchor, in the New-Exchange, in the Lower Walk.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "nouemb 22:"; the 7 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "6".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Anchor, in the New-Exchange, in the Lower Walk.
